name: Leech Bot
description: leech bot using aria as engine

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

APP_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

API_HASH.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

OWNER_ID.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: This is the folder ID of the Google Drive Folder to which you want to upload all the mirrors.

EDIT_SLEEP_TIME_OUT.description: The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to.

MAX_TG_SPLIT_FILE_SIZE.description: The path to the local folder where the downloads should be downloaded to.
